name: GetSubscription
description: Get a subscription to the orders

$ul: **consumerUnvailableSinceUtcDate**: This date indicates since when the subscription consumer is unavailable
**id**: The identifier of the subscription to the orders for a merchant
**lastOrderPushedModificationUtcDate**: This modification date correspond to the last order pushed by your subscription consumer
**lastRetryUtcDate**: The last date we retry to send orders
**lastSuccessfulOrderPushedUtcDate**: The date of the last pushed order successfully received by your subscription consumer
**maxRetryCount**: The maximum BeezUP will retry to push orders. When we the retry count will reach maximum retry count, the subscription will be deactivated.
**name**: The subscription name you want to use
**nextScheduledRetryUtcDate**: The next scheduled  date we retry to send orders
**recoverBeginPeriodOrderLastModificationUtcDate**: Recover existing orders using the begin period order last modification date. If not set then you will receive new/updated orders in real-time.
**recoverEndPeriodOrderLastModificationUtcDate**: Recover existing orders using the begin and the end period order last modification date.
**retryCount**: The retry count. When we the retry count will reach maximum retry count, the subscription will be deactivated.
**allOptionalParamsProvided**: indicates whether all optionals params have been provided
**allRequiredParamsProvided**: indicates whether all required params have been provided
**docUrl**: The documentation related to this operation.
**href**: Indicate the relative uri for this link
**label**: The label corresponding to the link. This label is automatically translated based on the Accept-Language http header.
**method**: Indicate the http method to use on this link (default: GET)
**rel**: Indicate the relation name related to the link
**urlTemplated**: indicates whether the href is templated or not

**allRequiredParamsProvided**: indicates whether all required params have been provided
